swad_ka_arambh.name: Mix Pakora Platter
swad_ka_arambh.description: Assortment of crispy pakoras including paneer, onion, potato, and spinach fritters, served with tangy chutney and cooling mint raita.

swad_ka_arambh.name: Punjabi Samosa
swad_ka_arambh.description: Crisp fried Indian snack with a delicious stuffing of potatoes & peas.

swad_ka_arambh.name: Chicken 65
swad_ka_arambh.description: Bite size pieces of chicken coated in spicy masala marination.

swad_ka_arambh.name: Achari Malai Soya Chaap
swad_ka_arambh.description: Protein-rich soya chunks with all of the flavors of Punjabi achar (pickle).

china_gate.name: Chilli Paneer
china_gate.description: Crispy paneer chunks tossed in a fiery, flavorful sauce with green chilies, garlic, and soy sauce for a deliciously spicy treat.

china_gate.name: Chilli Chicken
china_gate.description: Tender chicken pieces tossed in a spicy sauce with green chilies, garlic, and soy sauce.

china_gate.name: Chilli Shrimp
china_gate.description: Succulent shrimp tossed in a spicy sauce with green chilies, garlic, and soy sauce.

china_gate.name: Veg Hakka Noodles
china_gate.description: Stir-fried noodles with assorted vegetables, seasoned with soy sauce and aromatic spices.

china_gate.name: Chicken Hakka Noodles
china_gate.description: Stir-fried noodles with chicken and vegetables, seasoned with soy sauce and aromatic spices.

china_gate.name: Shrimp Hakka Noodles
china_gate.description: Stir-fried noodles with shrimp and vegetables, seasoned with soy sauce and aromatic spices.

china_gate.name: Veg Fried Rice
china_gate.description: Fluffy rice stir-fried with an assortment of fresh vegetables, seasoned with soy sauce and aromatic spices.

china_gate.name: Chicken Fried Rice
china_gate.description: Fluffy rice stir-fried with chicken and vegetables, seasoned with soy sauce and aromatic spices.

shorba_ki_dawat.name: Mulligatawny
shorba_ki_dawat.description: Spiced Indian soup with a base of lentils and vegetables, seasoned with a blend of curry spices like cumin, coriander, and turmeric.

shorba_ki_dawat.name: Tomato Shorba
shorba_ki_dawat.description: Tangy and flavorful Indian soup made primarily from tomatoes, seasoned with aromatic spices like cumin, ginger, and garlic.

anda_bahar.name: Boiled Egg Masala
anda_bahar.description: Boiled eggs in a spicy and flavorful tomato-based gravy, with Indian spices like cumin, coriander, and turmeric.

anda_bahar.name: Desi Masala Omelette/Bhurji
anda_bahar.description: A hearty Indian omelette/bhurji made with eggs, onions, tomatoes, green chilies, and cilantro, spiced with turmeric, cumin, and chili powder.

anda_bahar.name: Egg Lababdar/Anda Curry
anda_bahar.description: An Indian specialty featuring Sunnyside-up eggs or Boiled eggs simmered in a creamy tomato-based gravy with spices like cumin, coriander, and garam masala.

gali_mohalle_se.name: Vada Pav
gali_mohalle_se.description: A Mumbai street food consisting of a spicy potato fritter sandwiched inside a soft bun, garnished with chutneys and fried green chilies.

gali_mohalle_se.name: Dabeli
gali_mohalle_se.description: A tangy potato filling stuffed inside a soft bun, garnished with roasted peanuts and pomegranate seeds.

gali_mohalle_se.name: Pani Puri
gali_mohalle_se.description: Small puri balls filled with spiced chickpeas, black peas, and specially made spiced water.

gali_mohalle_se.name: Sev Puri
gali_mohalle_se.description: Puri filled with sweet yogurt and chaat chutneys.

gali_mohalle_se.name: Papdi Chaat
gali_mohalle_se.description: Papdi filled with boiled chickpeas, potatoes, spicy and sweet chutneys, curd, and chaat masala.

gali_mohalle_se.name: Pav Bhaji
gali_mohalle_se.description: Mumbai Pav Bhaji consists of a spicy mashed vegetable curry made from potatoes, peas, tomatoes, and spices, served with buttered and toasted bread rolls (pav).

gali_mohalle_se.name: Bhakhri Pizza
gali_mohalle_se.description: A fusion dish from Ahmedabad, a crispy Gujarati flatbread (bhakhri) topped with spicy sauces, vegetables, and cheese.

mansaahari_safar.name: Butter Chicken
mansaahari_safar.description: Aromatic golden chicken pieces swimming in an incredible curry sauce.

mansaahari_safar.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
mansaahari_safar.description: Yogurt-marinated chicken, skewered and chargrilled for barbeque flavors, cooked in a rich spiced tomato curry.

mansaahari_safar.name: Vindaloo Chicken/Lamb/Shrimp
mansaahari_safar.description: Delicious, spicy & flavorful Portuguese-Indian dish made by cooking chicken, lamb, or shrimp in a vindaloo spice paste.

mansaahari_safar.name: Chicken/Goat Kadhai
mansaahari_safar.description: Spicy and flavorful dish made with chicken or goat, onions, tomatoes, ginger, garlic, and freshly ground spices.

mansaahari_safar.name: Lamb Chop Masala
mansaahari_safar.description: Warming, aromatic, succulent, and flavorful lamb chops coated in a masala paste.

sabzi_mandi_se.name: Aloo Gobi
sabzi_mandi_se.description: A classic Indian dish made with potatoes and cauliflower, cooked with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

sabzi_mandi_se.name: Amritsari Chole
sabzi_mandi_se.description: Full-flavored preparation of chickpeas with a mix of spicy and tangy flavors.

sabzi_mandi_se.name: Malai Kofta
sabzi_mandi_se.description: Fried balls of potato and paneer in a rich, lightly sweet, creamy mild gravy.

sabzi_mandi_se.name: Paneer Manpasand
sabzi_mandi_se.description: Paneer cooked in a tangy and mildly sweet gravy featuring butter, tomatoes, spices, cashew paste, and cream.

sabzi_mandi_se.name: Sarson Da Saag/Palak Paneer/Saag Cheese
sabzi_mandi_se.description: Creamy and rich mustard greens or spinach cooked with spices. Add cheese for extra flavor.

sabzi_mandi_se.name: Dal Tadka/Dal Makhani
sabzi_mandi_se.description: Yellow lentils tempered with cumin and ghee or black lentils cooked with Indian spices, butter, and cream.

tandoor_ke_tukde.name: Angarey Paneer / Kakori Kebab
tandoor_ke_tukde.description: Fresh Indian cottage cheese cubes barbequed in a clay oven OR soft, flavorful vegetarian kebab made from a mix of vegetables, paneer, and aromatic spices.

tandoor_ke_tukde.name: Tandoori Shrimp/Lamb/Salmon Tikka
tandoor_ke_tukde.description: Shrimp, lamb, or salmon marinated in a spicy tandoori blend and grilled to perfection in a tandoor, served with zesty mint chutney.

tandoor_ke_tukde.name: Lehsuni Chicken Tikka
tandoor_ke_tukde.description: Small chicken pieces marinated in spices and yogurt before being chargrilled on skewers with garlic.

roti_kulcha_aur_naan.name: Butter Naan
roti_kulcha_aur_naan.description: Popular Indian flatbread made using refined flour, generously coated with butter.

roti_kulcha_aur_naan.name: Cheese Naan
roti_kulcha_aur_naan.description: Indian flatbread generously stuffed with cheese.

roti_kulcha_aur_naan.name: Onion Kulcha
roti_kulcha_aur_naan.description: Indian flatbread stuffed with a spiced onion filling.

roti_kulcha_aur_naan.name: Paneer Kulcha
roti_kulcha_aur_naan.description: Indian flatbread stuffed with a spiced Indian cottage cheese filling.

roti_kulcha_aur_naan.name: Laccha Paratha
roti_kulcha_aur_naan.description: Crispy flaky layered flatbreads made with whole wheat flour.

roti_kulcha_aur_naan.name: Bhature
roti_kulcha_aur_naan.description: Deep-fried Indian flatbread made with refined flour, typically served with chole.

roti_kulcha_aur_naan.name: Bullet/Peshawari Naan
roti_kulcha_aur_naan.description: Flatbread made with spicy stuffing (bullet) or sweet filling (Peshawari).

roti_kulcha_aur_naan.name: Roomali Roti
roti_kulcha_aur_naan.description: Unleavened Indian bread, soft and thin, made in traditional Mughlai cuisine.

biryani_ki_mehek.name: Vegetable Biryani
biryani_ki_mehek.description: Aromatic rice dish made with basmati rice, spices, and mixed vegetables.

biryani_ki_mehek.name: Paneer Biryani
biryani_ki_mehek.description: Aromatic rice dish made with basmati rice, spices, and paneer.

biryani_ki_mehek.name: Egg Biryani
biryani_ki_mehek.description: Aromatic rice dish made with basmati rice, spices, and boiled eggs.

biryani_ki_mehek.name: Chicken Biryani
biryani_ki_mehek.description: Aromatic rice dish made with basmati rice, spices, and tender chicken pieces.

biryani_ki_mehek.name: Shrimp Biryani
biryani_ki_mehek.description: Aromatic rice dish made with basmati rice, spices, and shrimp.

biryani_ki_mehek.name: Lamb Biryani
biryani_ki_mehek.description: Aromatic rice dish made with basmati rice, spices, and lamb.

biryani_ki_mehek.name: Goat Biryani
biryani_ki_mehek.description: Aromatic rice dish made with basmati rice, spices, and goat meat.

kool_jalpan.name: Salted/Sweet/Mango Lassi
kool_jalpan.description: Yogurt-based creamy beverage available in sweet, salted, or mango flavor.

kool_jalpan.name: Masala Soda
kool_jalpan.description: Refreshing Indian summer drink made using a few spices and soda water.

mishtaan.name: Gulab Jamun
mishtaan.description: Soft delicious berry-sized balls made with milk solids, flour, and a leavening agent, soaked in rose-flavored sugar syrup.

mishtaan.name: Gajar Halva
mishtaan.description: Deliciously rich and creamy carrot pudding topped with crunchy almonds and cashews.

mishtaan.name: Moong Dal Halva
mishtaan.description: Roasted moong dal simmered in milk and ghee with cardamom, topped with cashews and almonds.

mishtaan.name: Rasmalai
mishtaan.description: A classic Indian dessert consisting of juicy cheese discs served with thickened milk.

de_thali.name: Punjabi Thali (Veg)
de_thali.description: Unlimited thali with one appetizer, two sabzis, one lentil (Dal-Tadka), naan/roti, rice, one sweet, salad, papad, chutneys, pickles, and sweet/salted lassi. Available for dinner (except Tuesdays).

de_thali.name: Punjabi Thali (Non-Veg)
de_thali.description: Unlimited thali with one appetizer, one goat curry, one chicken curry, one veg subji, Dal-Tadka, naan/roti, rice, one sweet, salad, papad, chutneys, pickles, and sweet/salted lassi. Available for dinner (except Tuesdays).

de_thali.name: Rajasthani Thali
de_thali.description: Unlimited thali with one appetizer, two sabzis, Punchmel Dal, bati, paratha, one sweet, papad, chutneys, pickles, salad, and masala chhas. Available on Thursdays for dinner.

de_thali.name: Kathiyawadi Ras Thaal
de_thali.description: Unlimited thali with one appetizer, three sabzis, one kathol, khati meethi dal/kadhi, puri, rotli, rotlo, rice/khichdi, one sweet, papad, chutneys, pickles, kachumber/sambharo, and masala chhas. Available Friday-Sunday for dinner.

weekday_lunch.name: Vegetarian Entree
weekday_lunch.description: Choice of Saag Aloo, Paneer Makhanwala, Amritsari Chole, or Baingan Bharta.

weekday_lunch.name: Non-Vegetarian Entree
weekday_lunch.description: Choice of Chicken Kadhai, Chicken Dhania, Butter Chicken, Chicken Tikka Masala, or Butter Korma

weekday_lunch.name: Vegetarian Specials
weekday_lunch.description: Choice of Falafel Roll, Chur Chur Naan with Chole, Paratha (Gobi/Aloo/Paneer), Pav Bhaji, or Veg. Biryani.

weekday_lunch.name: Non-Vegetarian Specials
weekday_lunch.description: Choice of Bhurji Pav, Keema Pav, Chicken Roll, Tangdi Kebab, Chicken Biryani, or Anda Biryani.
